00072 template <class _Traits> mfHybridCell<_Traits>::mfHybridCell()
00073 {
00074 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00075         pthread_mutex_lock(&this->smutex);
00076 #endif
00077 
00078         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00079         {
00080                 edges[i] = -1;
00081         }
00082         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00083         {
00084         mates[i] = -1;
00085     }
00086         
00087         //numVertices = 4;
00088         //numEdges = 4;
00089 
00090 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00091         pthread_mutex_unlock(&this->smutex);
00092 #endif
00093 }

00104 template <class _Traits> int mfHybridCell<_Traits>::getNumberEdgesInCell()

00125 template <class _Traits> IDS mfHybridCell<_Traits>::getEdgeId(int index MF_DMUTEXV)
00126 {
00127         MF_ASSERT((index >= 0)&&(index < numEdges));
00128 
00129         MF_LOCK(smutex);
00130 
00131         ids temp = edges[index];
00132 
00133         MF_UNLOCK(smutex);
00134 
00135         return temp;
00136 }

00138 template <class _Traits> void mfHybridCell<_Traits>::setEdgeId(int index, ids edge MF_DMUTEXV)
00139 {
00140         MF_ASSERT((index >= 0)&&(index < numEdges));
00141 
00142         MF_LOCK(smutex);
00143 
00144         edges[index] = edge;
00145 
00146         MF_UNLOCK(smutex);
